stimulusHtml: Which of the following gives the total area enclosed by the graph of the polar curve r = θ sin 2θ for  0 ≤ θ ≤ 2 π ? MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4231@
choicesHtml: ∫ 0 2 x 1 2 | θ sin 2 θ | d θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4FBE@

∫ 0 2 x | θ sin 2 θ | d θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DF9@
∫ 0 2 x 1 2 | θ sin ( 2 θ ) | 2 d θ

∫ 0 2 x | θ sin 2 θ | 2 d θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4D74@

∫ 0 2 x π 2 | θ sin 2 θ | 2 d θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5194@
